Posts.Content: Hi Sandycol Sent you a PM with my email address. Look forward to hearing from you. Love and hugs Christine xxx
Posts.Title: Anyone need a friend

Posts.Content: Hi Vera I would be glad to hear from you. If you want to PM me and i will give you my email address. I am always here for a pink sista.  Take care xxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Anyone need a friend

Posts.Content: Hi all I am a 5 year breast cancer survivor. If anyone needs a friend to chat to about anything i am here for you. I am a good listener and if i can help anyone it will make me feel good.  Love and hugs to you all xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
